AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals suspected of crossing the border illegally, potentially traveling in a crowded pickup truck camper, often stopped by immigration agents based on their appearance and circumstances, indicated by fogged windows and heavy loading of the vehicle
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: vehicle stopped by United States Border Patrol more than 100 miles from the United States-Mexican border, on Interstate Highway 35, without evidence it had crossed the border, with factors present that satisfy the Brignoni-Ponce standard, including heavily loaded and fogged windows
